attributes.comment:
We are in the process of our second international adoption. Your proposed fees
would increase our costs to USCIS by $630 ($125 I600, $20 biometrics, $205 N600
AND $280 because our child is HIV+ and requires a waiver). If I felt you
provided reasonably fast service, were accommodating and friendly, I could
accept the increase. However, because for both adoptions I've had to ask for
our Senators office to inquire about delays, had to take time off work and drive
4 hours for fingerprinting AND will now have to wait 3 months or more for our
I601 waiver to be approved (while our child remains in an orphanage untreated
for HIV), I cannot support your increases. Please think twice before causing
more pain to adoptive families.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sherry
